SELECT a.name, a.din, b.name cname, c.name category, IFNULL(d.warn_level, 0) warn_level, e.next_time FROM device a LEFT JOIN company b ON a.cid=b.id LEFT JOIN device_category c ON a.code=c.code LEFT JOIN (SELECT device_id, MAX(warn_level) warn_level FROM alert WHERE `type` IN(1,2,3) GROUP BY device_id) d ON a.id=d.device_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT next_time,device_id FROM log_examine WHERE device_id=#{id} ORDER BY next_time DESC LIMIT 1) e ON a.id=e.device_id
where a.id = #{id}
SELECT next_time FROM log_examine WHERE device_id=#{id} ORDER BY next_time DESC LIMIT 1
